snippet.title: [TAS] Ice Metal 1: Uninstall - 100.9% by Dyceron in 59:00.03
snippet.description:
Rerecord Count: 30330
TAS Timing: 59:08.43
RTA Timing: 59:00.03
In-Game Time: 00:31

This is a Tool-Assisted Speedrun of the Super Metroid Hack, Ice Metal 1: Uninstall, done by me. This run strives to collect all 105 items, while beating the game as fast as possible. Just as a note, this TAS is NOT 100% optimized. There are still many improvements to be made, but considering it is my first ever TAS I think I did a pretty good job.

This run is full of clips and fast paced action. The route I used follows the current RTA route, with a small exception being when Ice Beam is collected.

Major shoutouts to EternisedDragon (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5M90zTdMDWQpxnCgcIuoRA) who helped me for a bunch of things in this TAS. I would not have made it far without his help.

Livestream of TAS with Commentary: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/78553295

• Livestream: https://twitch.tv/dyceron
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/dyceron
